/**
 * @fileoverview A library for making requests to the Box API.
 * @author fschott
 */
 
'use strict';
 
//------------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Requirements
//------------------------------------------------------------------------------
var merge = require('merge'),
	APIRequest = require('./api-request');
 
 
//------------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Public
//------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 
/**
 * A library for communicating with the Box API.
 *
 * @constructor
 * @param {Object} defaults Default options for each request made via each APIRequestClient
 *  instance.
 * @returns {void}
 */
function APIRequestClient(defaults) {
	this.defaults = defaults;
}
 
/**
 * Make a request to the API, and get the response via callback.
 *
 * @param {Object} options The request options
 * @param {Function} callback Called with the response, or an error if there was
 *  a problem with the request.
 * @returns {void}
 */
APIRequestClient.prototype.makeRequest = function(options, callback) {
    // Add default APIRequestClient options to each request
    options = merge(options, this.defaults);
 
    // Make the request
	var apiRequest = new APIRequest(options);
    apiRequest.execute(callback);
};
 
/**
 * Make a request to the API, and return a read stream for the response.
 *
 * @param {Object} options The request options
 * @returns {Stream} The response stream, which can be piped or otherwise handled.
 */
APIRequestClient.prototype.makeStreamingRequest = function(options) {
    // Add default APIRequestClient options to each request
    options = merge(options, this.defaults);
 
    // Make the request
	var apiRequest = new APIRequest(options);
	apiRequest.execute();
	return apiRequest.getResponseStream();
};
 
/**
 * @module box-sdk-node/lib/api-request-client
 * @see {@Link APIRequestClient}
 */
module.exports = APIRequestClient;
 
Generated by istanbul at Wed Apr 06 2016 23:36:03 GMT-0700 (PDT)
